Text: Är det någon som vet om det finns någon version av den här filmen där den svenska texten är synkad?

Yes I know.
I rented the this movie some time ago.
It had the same error.
The swedish subtitle comes 10 to 20 seconds after the talk, about 35 minutes into the movie.
The danish and the norwegian subtitle are OK, but difficult to understand.
It's to bad for such a good movie.
Any chance of anyone re-seeding this, there's about 7 of us stuck on 99.7% complete
